about_the_game:
Puppetmaster - Movie Viewer lets you complete your Puppetmaster collection with previous Episodes!

Please note: this product is interactive only to a minimum, not more. It only serves the purpose that you can enjoy the pre-rendered Episodes as well. This one is for the collectors amongst you 😉

Sensual Adventures - Episode 3: The Exhibition
For years, Brittany and Trinity searched for a missing fragment of an ancient Egyptian scroll. The girls believe the relic is a coded map leading to an undiscovered treasure, but without the missing piece, the code cannot be deciphered. When the lost fragment finally turns up as the feature artefact in an upcoming exhibition at the Museum of Cairo, the girls are too impatient to wait for the display to open to the public, so they decide to break in. Before Brittany can translate the inscription, however, the excitement gets the best of them and they end up fucking in the middle of the museum. Sensual Adventures - Episode 4: The Expedition
Sensual Adventures: Episode 4, The Expedition marks the conclusion of the first Sensual Adventures story arc. Brittany and Trinity continue their adventure in Egypt, this time journeying to a lost ruin where they discover unexpected pleasure... in the form of an Egyptian princess with an insatiable lust. Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: INTEL i5, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
